title: Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS – 1000 EV

specifications.label: Safety Features
specifications.value: Alarm, Front & Rear Warning Lights, Radar Safety System

description: Dynaclean Industries is the proud presenter of the Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS-1000 EV, a clean and effective solution for urban and industrial areas. This innovative, next-generation electric street cleaning vehicle, equipped with state-of-the-art technology and eco-friendly features, offers the highest road cleaning efficiency at zero emissions. It is, therefore, the perfect choice for smart cities, local governments, industries, airports, and university campuses. The Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS-1000 EV is equipped with a powerful suction apparatus, precision-controlled airflow, and is powered by a long-lasting lithium battery. It operates silently, making noise pollution virtually nonexistent. In addition, its sophisticated filtration system captures micro-dust and PM particles, contributing to a cleaner and healthier environment. In terms of performance and reliability, it features a robust steel body, a comfortable operator cabin, and an easy-to-use digital dashboard. As a heavy-duty cleaning vehicle and a Sweeper Machine, this multi-purpose device is suitable for large-area maintenance. Its ease of handling is comparable to that of a ride-on sweeper, providing excellent maneuverability even on difficult terrains and narrow streets. The DTMS-1000 EV is more than just a device — it is a pledge by Dynaclean Industries toward cleaner, greener, and smarter cities of the future.
keyFeatures: Zero Emissions & Eco-Friendly – Uses 100% electricity and eliminates air pollution.
Plant Washing System – Helps conserve and maintain the greenery.
Anti-Smog Water Spray System – Dust suppression and also helps to clean the air.
In-Built Jet Pressure Washer (130 Bar) – Used for deep cleaning of sidewalks, roads, and public places.
High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – Allows for longer operation: 900L water and 1000L dust collection.
Spacious & Comfortable Cabin – Allows space for two operators for effective cleaning management.
Long Battery Life – Operates for 10 hours continuously without requiring battery recharge.
Ergonomic & User-Friendly Design – Provides ease of operation with control provided on the sweeper.
Effective Sweeping in Shorter Duration – Aiding and ensuring greater productivity with larger sweeping widths (2500 mm).
